moduleMeta.name: temporalDownscaling
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: calculating hour weather data from daily values

var.name: prec_daily
var.description: daily precipitation at each grid of the study area

var.name: tmin_daily
var.description: daily minimum air temperature at each grid of the study area

var.name: tmax_daily
var.description: daily maximum air temperature at each grid of the study area

var.name: ep_daily
var.description: daily reference(potential) evapotranspiration at each grid of the study area

var.name: prec_hourly
var.description: hourly precipitation at each grid of the study area

var.name: temper_hourly
var.description: air temperature at each grid of the study area at current simluation hour

var.name: ep_hourly
var.description: hourly reference(potential) evapotranspiration at each grid of the study area
